channel.title: quarterly results on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in quarterly results on FinanClub

item.title: 1133 LCID
item.description: score:1133 Chances: Lucid Group is reporting quarterly results next week, which may bring insights into the company’s performance. Former Dow CEO and current Lucid board member, Andrew Liveris, weighing in on the EV maker’s plans could provide valuable perspectives. Lucid Group’s move into China’s EV market and expansion in the Middle East region might offer growth opportunities.

item.title: 0974 RIVN
item.description: score:974 Chances: Rivian’s rally has been driving higher over the past month, indicating positive market momentum. John Krafcik, a seasoned automotive executive, joining Rivian’s board of directors may bring valuable expertise and insights. One analyst believes Rivian could hit $40 per share, indicating potential for stock price growth.
